name: Qisah Tomang - Cycle of Hatred
description:
I AM THE FIST OF JUSTICE

I AM THE EYE OF VENGEANCE

I AM HATRED!

A Roguelike games where you run through as a very powerful Demon and destroy swarms of enemies.

 This game is made in RPG Maker MV for IGMC 2022.

Run through as a very powerful Demon and destroy swarms of enemies and take your vengeance!

Run and destroy everything in your way as the feral demon called Tomang, with a more powerful and stronger foe that will come to stop you.

Wreak havoc on the Empire army to fulfill your vengeful desire while the empire will seek help from neighboring territories to stop you.

During your rampage, a powerful general of its time will try to stop you. once you defeat them get close and eradicate them with a finishing move. With each general, the player will gain huge experience and Soul fragments.

At the end of your rampage, Soul Fragments can be used to Upgrade the Feral Demon's ability and power to give more powerful spells and buffs to help with your quest for vengeance.

Arrow Keys - Movement

Shift - Sprint/Walk

Q, W - Skill buttons

X - Pause

Z - Finishing moves
